channel.title: Pages on Parlons London
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Parlons London

item.title: Resources
item.description: We don’t teach French - we are deliberately a casual group just for conversation - there are no formal lessons or homework and no preparation is required. However here are some helpful links that our members recommend: Learning Duolingo - a website and smartphone app that teachs French and many other languages gradually, for free (or without ads for an annual fee) Memrise - a paid smartphone app that helps learn vocabulary Rosetta Stone - paid software with some similarities to Duolingo Free French course from TV5MONDE Immersion: Watching and Listening Radio-Canada podcasts - practice listening or just immerse yourself in the sounds France 24 - 24-hour international news TV station with a live feed, owned by the French Government (also available on YouTube) 239 French Conversations on YouTube News Courrier International - French language news from a variety of sources La Presse - independent, non-profit Qu√©bec news organisation Other Groups Duolingo Events has a lot of meetings, including in French
